ygData.subject: Newbie and solo questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Um, hi everyone *waves*.  I just joined the group and thought I d say hi.  My main is a wizard (obviously), though he s only mid-level.  I mostly play
ygData.messageBody:
Um, hi everyone *waves*. I just joined the group and thought I'd say
hi. My main is a wizard (obviously), though he's only mid-level. I
mostly play characters over on the E. Marr server.

I have a couple of questions though. Is it normal for wizards to die
about every five encounters? I have a definite tendency to get
killed. Also, anything that cons over light blue is almost
impossible for me to solo. Is this normal, or do I need to rethink
my strategies? I am having a lot of trouble finding a group since
LDON came out, so this is a pretty important question for me.

Sorry for the lame questions, but the only other wizard I know is
even lower level than I am, so we aren't much help to each other info
wise.

Siriln Starfire of Felwithe
33 wizard of the Legion of Kithicor

Cayrri of Halas
9 warrior

Liriina of Neriak
4 rogue of Bristlebane
